for_sales.sales_text: gaff cutter, built in 1906. 26ft, Shoal Draft with centre board. (2’6” draught with plate up). Pitch pine on oak, extremely good condition. Full suit of James Lawrence sails (only used for 1 season). 6HP 2018 outboard drops into cleverly engineered well in cockpit. New bunk cushions. Force 10 gas cooker. Immaculate survey 2018. Very fast! Winner of 2021 Swale Match, 1st visiting yacht and Concours d’Elegance. Reluctant sale as bought a bigger boat for increasing family!

boat.full_description:
Designed by FB Howden and built in 1906 by Gann & Palmer at Teignmouth, Devon, 'Almita' is 26ft LOA with a centre-plate which drops down through a ballast keel which only draws 2ft 6ins when raised.

Dick Durham reviews her performance in Yachting Monthly, June 2009 'Gaff vs. Bermudan'.
boat.name: Almita
boat.short_description: 'Almita' celebrated her 115th birthday by winning the Swale match in 2021, with 1st in class, 1st visiting yacht and best dressed of the regatta!
